resources.string: You have not called today! Click to call now.
Probation Buddy: You are required to test today!
Press OK to confirm that you have to go test today. This will activate reminders to make sure you don\'t forget to go!
Press OK to confirm that you have no tests today. All reminders will be finished until tomorrow!
Would you like to log your call?
Press OK to make an entry in your calendar about this call.
You have called in today, no tests.
You need to set your call-in phone number before making a call!
You have not called in today!
"To activate the daily repeating reminders, turn on the toggle switch at the top of the settings list. Then set your call-in phone number and start time, and you are good to go! "
"\n \n You can change your settings at any time and they will automatically be updated. "
"\n \n If you have any issues, you can contact the creator of this app by using the menu in the top right. "
Reminders to go test will stay active.
Press OK to confirm that you have finished your probation test. Reminders for today will stop!
Reminders are still active. Go test!
Test complete, stopping alarms until tomorrow morning!
Would you like to log your test?
Thank you for using Probation Buddy!

I made this app to help people succeed in their corrections programs. After going through one myself, I learned that it can be hard to keep track of your daily call-ins each and every day, even with standard alarms set on your phone.. and it really sucks to get in trouble for not calling in. I know from experience that being on probation and other court-ordered supervision can be a stressful time in your life, and hopefully this app can help out some. \n
Yes, activate reminders to go test
I need to call again later
Yes, cancel all reminders until tomorrow
